t24:applications.name: LIMIT
t24:applications.t24:allowed-functions: A B C D E H I L P Q R S V

t24:tooltip.t24:translation: Indicates the currency in which Limit is granted
Indicates the date on which limit is approved
Date by which customer must accept the facility
Specify the date and frequency for Limit Review
Indicates the Expiry Date of the Transaction
The date on which limit becomes available for use
Identifies which products are allowed to be used
Indicates the amount advised to the customer
Indicates if Limit is Fixed or Varies as perCollat
Indicates the Collateral attached to the Limit
Indicates Maximum value of the relevant Collateral
Collateral Right
Indicates Secured Amount against the Collateral
Total outstanding amount
Identifies the available amount
Maximum value of contracts to mature on one day
Indicates whether the limit is available for usage
Specifies Customer who can make use of the Limit
Currency which can use the Limit
Ceiling amount for the currency to use the limit
Specific company which may make use of the Limit
Collateral code
Identifies the customer account
Identifies the Limit Product
Indicates whether netting is allowed
Indicates the Dispo Officer
Online update of cash collaterals
Specifies the Increasing Type
Specifies the increasing frequency
Specifies the increasing currency
Specifies the increase amount
Specifies the increase end date
Additional information defined locally
Overrides generated by this transaction
The user who last updated the record
Date and time when record was input or authorised
Indicates the User who Authorises the record
Auditor Code
Date and time when record was audited

t24:fields.name: CHECK_CUST
t24:fields.t24:gen-operation: IF CUST.NO THEN CUST.NO ELSE LIAB.NO
